name: GSI Glacier Stainless Classic Flask 148ml
description: Up your game in the flask department with this shiny stainless-steel number. Tastefully designed, with a funnel included, it transports and pours your spirits in style.18/8 stainless steel construction with a silicone gasket, ensuring no flavour transfer.Funnel (included) reduces the risk of spillage.Smooth, rounded body allows for easy carry in your pocket.
